section.name: Introduction
section.p: The PAL webapps rely upon the following software components which must be installed and configured before installing the Datacenter Server.

section.name: Java Virtual Machine
section.p: Java (J2SE) version 1.4 or higher. Available from http://java.sun.com/j2se/downloads.html. Be aware that 1.4 does not support IP v6. The virtual machine ought to be run with assertions 'on', but it is not strictly necessary.

section.name: Web Service Manager
section.p: As the PAL webapps are provided in 'WAR' form, they need a web service manager or container to present themselves to the web. We have used and tested them with Tomcat, but others include WebSphere and JBoss.

subsection.name: Tomcat Server
subsection.p:
Requires version 4.1 or later, but we recommend 5.0. Available from http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/; Installation instructions http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.1-doc/RUNNING.txt. Other servlet containers should work, provided they support version 2.2 of the Servlets Spec.
Set shell variable CATALINA_HOME to the root of your tomcat installation, as described in the installation instructions.
